com.netflix.curator.x.discovery.details

Class ServiceDiscoveryImpl<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.curator.x.discovery.details.ServiceDiscoveryImpl<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServiceDiscovery<T>, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class ServiceDiscoveryImpl<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServiceDiscovery<T>
    A mechanism to register and query service instances using ZooKeeper

      • serviceProviderBuilder

        public ServiceProviderBuilder<T> serviceProviderBuilder()
        Allocate a new builder. ServiceProviderBuilder.providerStrategy(com.netflix.curator.x.discovery.ProviderStrategy<T>) is set to RoundRobinStrategy and ServiceProviderBuilder.refreshPaddingMs(int) is set to 1 second.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        the builder
